review: I really like the features of the Amazon Fire TV, with one exception.  Selecting movies or TV shows by voice automatically takes you to Amazon movies or TV shows.  Option for Alternative Viewing Options is too small to read from viewing distance, and twice I have inadvertently selected a movie or TV show and was charged for my selections even though I am a Prime member.  Dialog boxes' print should be made bigger so that are readable without having to get up and go to my TV screen to read what they say.  I was successful if having the first charge reversed, I hope I can have the second one removed also.
author: Robert P Worst

review: Much too limited for what it is.  I expected complete voice command and control but that's far far off into the future.  They need to rethink who they are targeting it for,  Competition is rampant is this market and I don't see where they excel at any level with this product.  The remote is toy sized and will easily be lost.  Overall a negative experience so I returned it.
